title: Crypto Networks
author: Crypto Networks
created_time: February 14, 2023, 01:44:12 PMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 11:54:11 PM by Crypto Networks
content: Rivetz cyber security token provides proof and assurance of privacy and security at a hardware level.Rivetz integrates trusted computing with blockchain technology to providef comprehensive privacy protectionacross multiple devices powered by the RvT token.Join and Apply:Join Slack: https://rivet-token.herokuapp.com/Join Telegram: Apply using form below: Spreadsheet: Payments:5% of Bounty budget will be allocated to cover Telegram and Slack Bounty program. Payment will be made along with all other bounties.One user can join both platformsRequirements to get paid:1: You must join the Telegram and/or Slack channel and stay there till the end of Crowdsale.1: an at least 2 month old bitcointalk, twitter or reddit (or 2 month older account in any social platform)2: an Ethereum wallet (wallet must be an  ERC20 Token Supporting. do not use any exchange address)Rules:1: User must stay on the group till the end of crowdsale.2: User must be active and supportive in the group. inactive users can get 50% less payrate or can be simply disqualified.3: Using bad language, spamming, advertising any other service in Reality Clash groups not allowed.4: Only one account on each platform allowed. a person found to be cheating by creating multiple accounts will be disqualified.5: Having a 2 month older bitcointalk, twitter, facebook or reddit account is mandatory.. using brand new accounts of these platforms will not be accepted.6: Do not post any Spammy message or confirmation of your joining bounties. Like "Hello, I've Joined" Hi, I am in, Hi, I joined bounty" etc etc,, Only ask valid questions related to the project, reply to answers which you can or want to anser and discuss anything related to the project, but  you don't need to post any hello , hi or any kind of smilly and emojy at the time of joining to prove your membership.
